title: Eight Steps to Happiness: The Buddhist Way of Loving Kindness
description: The book explains eight beautiful verses that comprise one of Buddhism's best loved and most enduring teachings. This short text reveals profound yet totally practical methods to enable a powerful opening of the heart, the source of all true happiness. It provides an inspiring explanation of Buddhism's best teachings, practical instructions to transform life's difficulties and essential advice on ohw to awaken your potential.
